selected_quotes: Interesting research on why schools and students shun #language GCSEs; need to show that the challenge pays off!
People living in the UK must improve their language skills to prepare for life after Brexit
Let's kick-start the week with a looks at why foreign language learning is invaluable
Lack of foreign language skill is estimated to cost the UK up to £48 billion a year
Excellent article. The UK already at a disadvantage with lack of language skills. #Brexit

facebook.title: Why just speaking English isn’t going to cut it anymore
facebook.summary: An article from a UK perspective that asserts that the "lack of foreign language skill is estimated to cost the nation up to £48 billion a year." And other reasons why, post-Brexit, language study may be even more important than before.

facebook.title: Why just speaking English isn’t going to cut it anymore
facebook.summary:
We have often advocated in favour of #multilingualism. Here is the umpteenth reason why this matters.
